title: The Werewolf's Mate
description: Jamie's position as a beta in the Dark Woods pack has become all work and no play. His alpha, Carl, expects him to be at his beck and call day and night when his leadership of the pack is called into question after a spate of attacks on the pack's estate. After a new pack is spotted sniffing around the Dark Woods territory, Carl assigns Jamie the task of investigating.  On a rare night off, Jamie meets Eli, an enigmatic alpha cast out by his pack, Jamie's future no longer seems certain. The two are mates and Eli is determined to be with Jamie even though the beta wolf rejects his advances.  When the Dark Woods pack is viciously attacked, Jamie is forced to make a choice, and after Eli is subjected to a horrifying assault, he finds he can no longer deny the love he feels for his mate. But even mates can be torn apart, and Jamie ends up paying the price for Eli's sins.  As Eli's haunting past finally catches up with him and his new found happiness is wrenched away, Eli must use all of his alpha powers to save his mate and destroy his enemies for good.  The Werewolf's Mate is a novella set in the city of Dark Woods. This novella contains explicit language and gay sexual scenes. It is intended for adult readers only.
author: Sam Abbot
